title: FreeZeroCoin
author: FreeZeroCoin
content: We have big news for Litecoin :article about MWEB :Litecoin's Long-Expected MWEB to Activate May 19: Charlie Leehttps://1ink.cc/hCLitecoin current usage without privacy option (transactions per day) :https://i.ibb.co/h8kvXwf/ltc.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/h8kvXwf/ltc.jpgDo you expect we will see more usage of Litecoin with the new privacy option?
